org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.axis
Class AxisPanel

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.axis.AxisPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
GssElement
public class AxisPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements GssElement

An AxisPanel is a container which holds multiple Axis objects

In addition to holding Axis objects, AxisPanels are positioned (LEFT/RIGHT/TOP/BOTTOM) and have orientation.

They are responsible for partitioning their space and allocating that space to each Axis, as well as using GSS "axes" properties to fill the background of the panel when cleared.
